meanings.definition: Not appealing or attractive in a sexual manner.
meanings.sent1: The outfit she wore to the party was the unsexiest thing I had ever seen.
meanings.sent2: The old, torn socks were the unsexiest clothing item in his wardrobe.
meanings.sent3: Despite his attempts to look cool, his unsexiest hat made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned house on the corner of the street had the unsexiest appearance.
meanings.sent5: The unsexiest car in the parking lot was covered in rust and dents.

meanings.definition: Lacking qualities that are traditionally associated with being sexy.
meanings.sent1: Her unsexiest feature was her crooked smile.
meanings.sent2: The unsexiest actor in the movie played the role of a clumsy sidekick.
meanings.sent3: The unsexiest puppy at the shelter kept tripping over its own paws.
meanings.sent4: The unsexiest flower in the garden was wilting and losing its petals.
meanings.sent5: His unsexiest dance moves made everyone giggle at the party.
